post:
I have an OVH SP 16G server for which I have no use for at the moment.

Specs:

Processor:  Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3570S CPU @ 3.10GHz
RAM:  16GB DDR3
HDD:  2 x 2TB
Network port speed: 200Mbps (premium bandwidth)
IP addresses: 1 (additional available - require extended features @ $20 per month)

Location:  OVH Canada

Price:  $65.00 per month
Payment method: Paypal

For more info or to order, kindly PM me or e-mail sales[at]perfectip[dot]co[dot]za.

Since OVH has changed their pricing and introduced setup fees etc., I would prefer to let someone use the server, rather than cancelling it at OVH.
